network.protocol

Enum ClientTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ClientTypes>
      • network.protocol.ClientTypes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ClientTypes>

    public enum ClientTypes
extends java.lang.Enum<ClientTypes>
    Enum of all protocol strings which can be received by the client.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
    See Also:
    ClientConnection

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BUILDING
      The type of message a client receives when a Construction has been built.
      CHATMESSAGE
      The type of message a client receives when a chat message has been send to the Server.
      DEVELOMENTCARD_BOUGHT
      The type of message a client receives when a DevelopmentCard has been bought.
      DICE
      The type of message a client receives when the Dice have been rolled.
      ERROR
      The type of message a client receives when the selected color is not available.
      GAME_FINISHED
      The type of message a client receives when the game ends.
      GAME_STARTED
      The type of message a client receives when the game starts.
      HELLO
      The type of message a client receives when connecting to a Server.
      LARGEST_ARMY
      The type of message a client receives when the owner of the largest army changes.
      LONGEST_ROAD
      The type of message a client receives when the owner of the longest road changes.
      PLAY_KNIGHT
      The type of message a client receives when a Player wants to play a knight card.
      PLAY_MONOPOLY
      The type of message a client receives when a Player wants to play a Monopoly card.
      PLAY_ROAD_BUILDING
      The type of message a client receives when a Player wants to play a Road Building card.
      PLAY_YEAR_OF_PLENTY
      The type of message a client receives when a Player wants to play a Year Of Plenty card.
      PRICE
      The type of message a client receives when a Player looses some Resources.
      RESOURCE_QUANTITY
      The type of message a client receives when a Player gains some Resources.
      ROBBER_MOVED
      The type of message a client receives when the Robber has been moved.
      SERVER_REPLY
      The type of message a client receives after each request to the Server.
      STATE_UPDATE
      The type of message a client receives when the state of a User or Player has been changed.
      TRADE_ACCEPTED
      The type of message a client receives when a Player accepts a trading offer.
      TRADE_CANCELED
      The type of message a client receives when a Player cancels a trading offer.
      TRADE_EXECUTED
      The type of message a client receives when a Player finishes a trade.
      TRADE_OFFER
      The type of message a client receives when a Player makes a trading offer.
      WELCOME
      The type of message a client receives when its protocol version has been accepted by the Server.
